Human Ken Doll Rodrigo Alves has been speaking openly about the consequences of his extensive catalogue of cosmetic procedures.

British-Brazilian Rodrigo, 36, has had more than £600k worth of plastic surgeries.

Speaking to MailOnline , Rodrigo revealed that his nose has started to collapse again, following his 11th nose job early this year.

Rodrigo said: "The results of this surgery were very pleasing at first but now I am going to have to have another surgery because it is sinking and I am scared, to be honest.

"Each time is riskier than the last and I'm worried that doctors aren't going to be able to fix my nose permanently."

The last time he had a similar operation was to help him breath - doctors ten issued a warning that he could develop a hole in his face if he keeps up with the cosmetic procedures.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: Mediaset)

On Italian TV show Domenica Live, during a recent appearance, the host bluntly asked Rodrigo what had happened to his nose.

He solemnly replied: "It's collapsing and I'm afraid to have another surgery to fix it."

Despite his own and his doctors' concerns, Rodrigo did undergo a fitting for a gastric balloon over the weekend.

A gastric balloon is placed in the stomach and reduces weight.

He spoke about his history of surgeries, saying: "I only had 72 surgeries because I had a lot of complications and things had to be repaired in the start.

(Image: Mediaset)

"It used to be a want. Now it's a need.

"I am a human and like everyone else I have feelings. I can also be vulnerable, I'm just very strong.

"At the moment I'm looking for non-surgical procedures which doesn't involve general anaesthesia in order to maintain my looks."

He has previously told how he felt the need to create the perfect male form.

He said: "Male perfection is to me having symmetry.

"So a chiselled face, broad shoulders, a lean figure, a prominent jawline, defined abs and a chest in proportion.

"I have had a hair implant, a brow lift, eye lifts, my ears pinned back, cheeks redesigned, my jawline shaped.

"I've had cheek implants twice, the sides of my lips cut out in order to give me a bigger, wider smile.

"I have had fillers injected into my shoulders, biceps, triceps, my abs - my six pack is purely plastic surgery. I have the most beautiful six pack."
description: Rodrigo revealed that his nose has started to collapse following his 11th rhinoplasty back in January
